content:
Ahhh—it's too difficult!
The bugs stay still when they're resting,
but if you run past them, they'll get startled.

Swinging the insect net through the air,
Drawing an elegant arc to capture the butterfly within,
As expected of Frostia! I'm left in awe.

I'll observe how insects dance
through all four seasons,
to feel nature's ever-changing rhythms!

But having to move slowly and cautiously,
observing every step of the way...
This is torture, mah!
